Ron Gruesbeck

I'm a software developer specializing in Node.js and Front-End JavaScript I'm currently a software consultant, and Gospel musician. Prior to that, I co-founded Nixie Agency.

I am interested in P2P web technologies (WebRTC) and protocols (SSB, IPFS). I created Multibook a webapp version of a "Real Book" with React and IPFS. Other personal projects include a Web RTC signal server, and browser client for P2P file transfers.

I'm most comfortable with JavaScript, Node.js, React, Linux, Docker, and AWS.

Resume, GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter.
